Welcome to the GGRiviyaa SMTP Server

This page serves as a simple front-end for your SMTP server. It's designed to be clean and easy to understand, providing a base for testing and development of email functionalities.

You can connect your front-end applications to the server you've built to send emails programmatically. This server is a robust solution for handling contact forms, transactional emails, and other server-side email tasks securely.
